description:
'''Boitumelo Thulo''' (born April 28, 1990), popularly known as '''Boity''', is a South African television personality, rapper, actress, businesswoman and model. In 2019, Thulo was named as one of [[Forbes|''Forbes'' Africa]]'s 30 Under 30 for her contribution in the music and entertainment sector.

She came to spotlight after the release of her debut single "[[Wuz Dat?]]"  in 2018 featuring [[Nasty C]]. In 2020, she signed a record deal with [[Def Jam Africa]] and release her EP ''[[4436]]''. The EP was nominated for Best Hip Hop Album at the [[27th South African Music Awards]].
